name: ACE COMBAT™ ASSAULT HORIZON LEGACY +
description: Control the sky with complete freedom in 3D! ACE COMBAT™ ASSAULT HORIZON LEGACY + is a revamped version of ACE COMBAT™ ASSAULT HORIZON LEGACY released in 2012, but adapted to the New Nintendo 3DS™ (also compatible with Nintendo 3DS™). ACE COMBAT FAMOUS FEATURES with freedom of flying and fighing from the series are back! AIRCRAFT COLLABORATION WITH NINTENDO available to customize real-life aircrafts with famous characters such as «Mario» and «Bowser». New Nintendo 3DS™ C Stick COMPATIBILITY, ZR and ZL buttons for better control on aircrafts. amiibo™ INTERACTION to unlock exclusive aircrafts from the same character (updating data of the Nintendo 3DS™ system is required for amiibo compatibility). Visit amiibo.nintendo.com.au for compatible amiibo™ and the latest information. To use amiibo on Nintendo 3DS,Nintendo 3DS XL and Nintendo 2DS systems a Nintendo 3DS NFC Reader/Writer is required. The Nintendo 3DS NFC Reader/Writer will be available later this year.
